title.rendered: “IDF Targets Hezbollah Terrorist: Successful Demolition of a Military Base in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Documentation: After precise tracking of a Hezbollah terrorist, the IDF destroyed a military building in Southern Lebanon.

Earlier today, an IDF force identified a terrorist from the Hezbollah terror organization operating in the Aita al-Shaab area and began trailing him. During the pursuit, the terrorist was identified entering a military building in the area.

Shortly after the identification, Air Force fighter jets attacked the building in which the terrorist was located and demolished the infrastructure.

In addition, a short while ago, two launchings were identified crossing from Lebanese territory to Mount Dov’s area.

Attached is documentation from the attack: https://bit.ly/3JFQvCg
